channel.title: Where can i change exp for hay stacks targets dummys ect and where can i add obj
channel.description:
ok i rune off testscape
ZamaZScape is my server name and i need to know how to raise the exp gained form hitting dummy closing door ect
aloso how do i add objects kike targets ect
finally my stat maxes are 135/99 how do i change it to 135/135 :|

item.title: Where can i change exp for hay stacks targets dummys ect and where can i add obj
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

n0vamage:

id imagine that means he runs a testscape source, and im not sure how to change the xp in that hit a monster and search how much xp it gives untill you find it thats all i can say

Oh… I don’t know either, I never messed with it. It was perfect the way it was!

~^!^~Odimaru~^!^~

item.source: Where can i change exp for hay stacks targets dummys ect and where can i add obj

item.title: Where can i change exp for hay stacks targets dummys ect and where can i add obj
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

Well I can help you on how to change the exp, But change the 135/99 and the add obj no.

go to your client.java and search the case of the hay dummy and door. Like the hay is case 299: then the case will end with break; in between case 299: and the break; there should be something like

addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[1]), 1); Change the number before the * to the xp that you want to get from the hay.

Read full topic
